QuestData.Title: Thieving Dwarves
QuestData.Description: Cutter is on the trail of the artifact the dwarves stole. He has the nose of a wolf when it comes to hunting in the jungle.$b$bFollow the canyons south until you find him.$b$bIt would seem the wolf queen and I are going to do more damage here before we leave.$b$BWe will follow as quickly as we can.
QuestData.RewardText: Wow. Those... "dwarves"... sure do know how to make both botani AND goren mad.
